com.box.sdk

Class BoxTrash

  • Object
    • BoxTrash
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<BoxItem.Info>

    public class BoxTrash
extends Object
implements Iterable<BoxItem.Info>
    Provides methods for deleting, recovering, and viewing a user's trashed files and folders.

    Unless otherwise noted, the methods in this class can throw an unchecked BoxAPIException (unchecked meaning that the compiler won't force you to handle it) if an error occurs. If you wish to implement custom error handling for errors related to the Box REST API, you should capture this exception explicitly.

      • getFolderInfo

        public BoxFolder.Info getFolderInfo(String folderID,
                                    String... fields)
        Gets information about a trashed folder that's limited to a list of specified fields.
        Parameters:
        folderID - the ID of the trashed folder.
        fields - the fields to retrieve.
        Returns:
        info about the trashed folder containing only the specified fields.

      • restoreFolder

        public BoxFolder.Info restoreFolder(String folderID)
        Restores a trashed folder back to its original location.
        Parameters:
        folderID - the ID of the trashed folder.
        Returns:
        info about the restored folder.

      • restoreFolder

        public BoxFolder.Info restoreFolder(String folderID,
                                    String newName,
                                    String newParentID)
        Restores a trashed folder to a new location with a new name.
        Parameters:
        folderID - the ID of the trashed folder.
        newName - an optional new name to give the folder. This can be null to use the folder's original name.
        newParentID - an optional new parent ID for the folder. This can be null to use the folder's original parent.
        Returns:
        info about the restored folder.
